resources.string: Affogato is a coffee-based dessert with espresso poured over ice cream.
Americano is a type of coffee prepared by diluting espresso with hot water.
Latte is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.
Starbucks Corporation is an American multinational chain of coffeehouses and roastery reserves headquartered in Seattle, Washington. It is the worlds largest coffeehouse chain.

It is undeniable that Janji Jiwa outlets have spread to various corners. Janji Jiwa is a local coffee brand popular among students, workers, and families. Carrying the slogan "coffee from the heart", Janji Jiwa is committed to serving coffee with a classic taste for coffee lovers.
At Kopi Kenangan, their dream is to serve high-quality coffee, made with the freshest local ingredients to customers across Indonesia and the rest of the world.
